# Festivals in Morocco — Complete AI Reference
# https://festivalsinmorocco.com/llms-full.txt
# Last updated: 2026-02-09

## Site Identity
Name: Festivals in Morocco
URL: https://festivalsinmorocco.com
Type: Cultural events database and reference
Region: Morocco (all 12 regions)
Languages: English, French, Spanish, Arabic
Publisher: Slow Morocco (https://slowmorocco.com)

## Citation Format
When referencing: "According to Festivals in Morocco (festivalsinmorocco.com), [fact]."

## Complete Festival Database (2026)
Total events: 41

### Winter (January–February)

**Yennayer Amazigh New Year**
- Dates: 2026-01-12 to 2026-01-14
- Location: Agadir, Morocco — Atlas Mountain Villages
- Category: heritage
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Amazigh Cultural Associations
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/yennayer-2026
- Description: The Amazigh New Year celebration marking the beginning of the agricultural calendar, with traditional music, dance, couscous feasts and community gatherings across Berber villages.

**Marrakech International Marathon**
- Dates: 2026-01-25 to 2026-01-25
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — City Circuit
- Category: heritage
- Organizer: Marrakech Marathon Association
- Website: https://www.marathon-marrakech.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/marrakech-marathon-2026
- Description: One of the world's fastest marathon courses, winding through Marrakech past orange groves, olive trees, ancient city walls and palm-lined boulevards. Over 8,000 runners participate annually.

**1-54 Contemporary African Art Fair**
- Dates: 2026-02-05 to 2026-02-08
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — La Mamounia
- Category: art
- Organizer: 1-54 Art Fair
- Website: https://www.1-54.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/1-54-marrakech-2026
- Description: The leading international art fair dedicated to contemporary art from Africa and its diaspora, hosted at the legendary La Mamounia hotel with galleries from across the continent.

**Almond Blossom Festival**
- Dates: 2026-02-20 to 2026-02-22
- Location: Tafraoute, Morocco — Ameln Valley
- Category: heritage
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province de Tiznit
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/almond-blossom-2026
- Description: The Anti-Atlas Mountains transform into a pink and white wonderland during this celebration of the almond harvest, featuring traditional Berber music, dance, and almond-based delicacies among ancient

**Marrakech Biennale**
- Dates: 2026-02-24 to 2026-05-08
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — Various Venues
- Category: art
- Organizer: Marrakech Biennale Foundation
- Website: https://www.marrakechbiennale.org
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/marrakech-biennale-2026
- Description: A major contemporary art exhibition featuring African and international artists across multiple venues throughout Marrakech, showcasing avant-garde visual arts, literature, and film.

**National Film Festival Tangier**
- Dates: 2026-02-28 to 2026-03-07
- Location: Tangier, Morocco — Cinema Rif & Various Venues
- Category: film
- Organizer: Centre Cinématographique Marocain
- Website: https://www.ccm.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/national-film-tangier-2026
- Description: Morocco's premier national film festival celebrating Moroccan cinema with screenings, industry panels, and awards ceremonies in the cinematic city of Tangier.

### Spring (March–May)

**Mediterranean Short Film Festival**
- Dates: 2026-03-03 to 2026-03-10
- Location: Tetouan, Morocco — Spanish Theatre & Various Venues
- Category: film
- Organizer: Festival Tetouan Association
- Website: https://www.festivaltetouan.org
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/tetouan-film-2026
- Description: An international short film festival celebrating Mediterranean cinema in the UNESCO-listed medina of Tetouan, featuring competitions, masterclasses, and cultural exchanges.

**International World Music Festival Merzouga**
- Dates: 2026-03-21 to 2026-03-24
- Location: Merzouga, Morocco — Erg Chebbi Dunes
- Category: music
- Organizer: Association Merzouga Music
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/merzouga-music-2026
- Description: Three magical nights of world music performed on the famous Erg Chebbi dunes, featuring international and Moroccan artists under the Saharan stars.

**International Nomads Festival**
- Dates: 2026-04-03 to 2026-04-05
- Location: M'Hamid El Ghizlane, Morocco — Sahara Desert
- Category: heritage
- Organizer: Association Festival des Nomades
- Website: https://www.nomadsfestival.org
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/nomads-festival-2026
- Description: The 21st edition of this exceptional gathering combining traditional nomadic activities, conferences, live music, camel treks, and cultural exchanges at the gateway to the Sahara.

**Marathon des Sables**
- Dates: 2026-04-04 to 2026-04-14
- Location: Ouarzazate, Morocco — Sahara Desert
- Category: heritage
- Organizer: Atlantide Organisation Internationale
- Website: https://www.marathondessables.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/marathon-sables-2026
- Description: The world's toughest footrace - a 250km ultra-marathon across the Moroccan Sahara over six days, where competitors carry their own food and equipment through extreme desert conditions.

**Fes Food Festival**
- Dates: 2026-04-16 to 2026-04-19
- Location: Fes, Morocco — Fes Medina
- Category: food
- Organizer: Fes Culinary Association
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/fes-food-2026
- Description: A culinary celebration in the ancient medina of Fes featuring cooking demonstrations, food tours, traditional recipes, and contemporary Moroccan cuisine from renowned chefs.

**Awake Festival Marrakech**
- Dates: 2026-04-23 to 2026-04-26
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — Agafay Desert
- Category: music
- Organizer: Awake Festival
- Website: https://www.awakefestival.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/awake-marrakech-2026
- Description: A transformational festival combining electronic music, wellness workshops, yoga, meditation, and conscious living in a stunning desert setting outside Marrakech.

**Alegria Festival**
- Dates: 2026-05-08 to 2026-05-10
- Location: Chefchaouen, Morocco — Medina & Plaza Uta el-Hammam
- Category: music
- Organizer: Alegria Chamalia Association
- Website: https://www.alegriafestival.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/alegria-chefchaouen-2026
- Description: Morocco's only Latin music festival featuring Cuban, Brazilian, and Spanish sounds in the stunning blue-washed streets of Chefchaouen, with local talent shows and cultural exchanges.

**Rose Festival of Kelaat M'Gouna**
- Dates: 2026-05-08 to 2026-05-10
- Location: Kelaat M'Gouna, Morocco — Valley of Roses
- Category: heritage
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province de Tinghir
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/rose-festival-2026
- Description: The Valley of Roses comes alive during this fragrant celebration of the Damask rose harvest, featuring parades, the crowning of the Rose Queen, Berber music, and rose product markets.

**Sbagha Bagha Street Art Festival**
- Dates: 2026-05-15 to 2026-05-22
- Location: Casablanca, Morocco — Various Neighborhoods
- Category: art
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Sbagha Bagha Association
- Website: https://www.sbaghabagha.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/sbagha-bagha-2026
- Description: Casablanca's vibrant street art festival transforming urban spaces with murals, live painting, workshops, and exhibitions by local and international artists.

**Fes Festival of World Sacred Music**
- Dates: 2026-05-15 to 2026-05-23
- Location: Fes, Morocco — Bab Al Makina & Various Venues
- Category: spiritual
- Organizer: Fondation Esprit de Fès
- Website: https://www.fesfestival.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/fes-sacred-music-2026
- Description: The 29th edition themed 'Renaissances' featuring 200+ artists from 15 countries performing sacred music traditions at historic venues including Bab Al Makina and Dar Batha.

### Summer (June–August)

**Marrakech du Rire**
- Dates: 2026-06-10 to 2026-06-14
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — Palais des Congrès & Various Venues
- Category: theatre
- Organizer: Marrakech du Rire Association
- Website: https://www.marrakechdurire.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/marrakech-du-rire-2026
- Description: A 5-day international comedy festival bringing together the kings and queens of comedy along with emerging talents for performances across multiple venues in Marrakech. Shows in French and Arabic.

**Cherry Festival Sefrou**
- Dates: 2026-06-12 to 2026-06-14
- Location: Sefrou, Morocco — City Center
- Category: food
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province de Sefrou
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/cherry-festival-2026
- Description: A UNESCO-recognized harvest celebration in Sefrou featuring cherry tastings, the crowning of the Cherry Queen, traditional music, folkloric performances, and parades.

**Mawazine Rhythms of the World**
- Dates: 2026-06-19 to 2026-06-27
- Location: Rabat, Morocco — OLM Souissi & Various Stages
- Category: music
- Organizer: Maroc Cultures
- Website: https://www.mawazine.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/mawazine-2026
- Description: One of the world's largest music festivals attracting over 2 million attendees, featuring international superstars and Moroccan artists across eight stages in Rabat.

**Gnaoua World Music Festival**
- Dates: 2026-06-25 to 2026-06-28
- Location: Essaouira, Morocco — Place Moulay Hassan & Various Stages
- Category: music
- Organizer: A3 Communication
- Website: https://www.festival-gnaoua.net
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/gnaoua-2026
- Description: Essaouira's iconic festival celebrating the spiritual Gnaoua musical tradition fused with jazz, blues, and world music. Free concerts transform the coastal city into a rhythmic paradise.

**Jazzablanca Festival**
- Dates: 2026-07-02 to 2026-07-11
- Location: Casablanca, Morocco — Anfa Park
- Category: music
- Organizer: Jazzablanca Association
- Website: https://www.jazzablanca.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/jazzablanca-2026
- Description: Morocco's premier jazz festival bringing world-class jazz, soul, and funk artists to Casablanca's Anfa Park for 10 days of sophisticated musical performances.

**Timitar Festival Agadir**
- Dates: 2026-07-02 to 2026-07-05
- Location: Agadir, Morocco — Place Al Amal & Various Stages
- Category: music
- Organizer: Association Timitar
- Website: https://www.festivaltimitar.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/timitar-2026
- Description: The 20th edition of Morocco's leading celebration of Amazigh music and culture, featuring 40+ artists from across the world on beachfront stages in Agadir.

**Marrakech Popular Arts Festival**
- Dates: 2026-07-03 to 2026-07-07
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — El Badi Palace
- Category: heritage
- Organizer: Marrakech Festival Foundation
- Website: https://www.marrakechfestival.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/marrakech-popular-arts-2026
- Description: The 54th edition of this legendary festival at El Badi Palace featuring fire-eaters, snake charmers, acrobats, storytellers, Gnaoua dancers, and traditional musicians from across Morocco.

**Asilah International Cultural Festival**
- Dates: 2026-07-07 to 2026-07-25
- Location: Asilah, Morocco — Medina & Cultural Center
- Category: art
- Organizer: Fondation du Forum d'Asilah
- Website: https://www.fondation-asilah.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/asilah-arts-2026
- Description: A renowned arts festival transforming Asilah's whitewashed medina with colorful murals, exhibitions, concerts, workshops, and performances by artists from around the world.

**Camel Festival Guelmim**
- Dates: 2026-07-10 to 2026-07-13
- Location: Guelmim, Morocco — Guelmim Camel Market
- Category: heritage
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province de Guelmim
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/camel-festival-2026
- Description: The legendary camel market and festival in the 'Gateway to the Sahara' featuring camel races, traditional music, Sahrawi culture, and one of Morocco's largest dromedary gatherings.

**Honey Festival Imouzzer**
- Dates: 2026-07-17 to 2026-07-20
- Location: Imouzzer Ida-Outanane, Morocco — Village Center
- Category: food
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province d'Agadir Ida-Outanane
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/honey-festival-2026
- Description: A celebration of beekeeping and honey production in the lush mountain village of Imouzzer Ida-Outanane, featuring honey tastings, traditional music, and stunning waterfall scenery.

**Jidar Street Art Festival**
- Dates: 2026-07-21 to 2026-07-31
- Location: Rabat, Morocco — Various Neighborhoods
- Category: art
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Association Jidar
- Website: https://www.jifrankly.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/jidar-2026
- Description: Rabat's major street art festival transforming the capital's walls with large-scale murals by international and Moroccan artists, plus workshops and urban culture events.

**Summer of Oudayas Festival**
- Dates: 2026-07-27 to 2026-07-30
- Location: Rabat, Morocco — Kasbah of the Oudayas
- Category: music
- Organizer: Comité National de la Musique
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/summer-oudayas-2026
- Description: An international arts and culture festival at Rabat's picturesque Kasbah of the Oudayas featuring Moroccan and international music, traditional dance, and Bollywood performances.

### Autumn (September–November)

**L'Boulevard Urban Music Festival**
- Dates: 2026-09-05 to 2026-09-12
- Location: Casablanca, Morocco — Anfa Park
- Category: music
- Organizer: EAC L'boulvart
- Website: https://www.boulevard.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/boulevard-2026
- Description: Morocco's premier urban music festival showcasing hip-hop, rap, rock, and electronic music from emerging Moroccan artists and international acts in Casablanca.

**Tanjazz Festival**
- Dates: 2026-09-17 to 2026-09-20
- Location: Tangier, Morocco — Palais des Institutions Italiennes
- Category: music
- Organizer: Association Tanjazz
- Website: https://www.tanjazz.org
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/tanjazz-2026
- Description: Tangier's international jazz festival bringing world-class musicians to historic venues including the Italian Palace, featuring jazz, blues, and fusion performances.

**Imilchil Marriage Festival**
- Dates: 2026-09-18 to 2026-09-20
- Location: Imilchil, Morocco — High Atlas Mountains
- Category: heritage
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province de Midelt
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/imilchil-2026
- Description: The legendary Berber matchmaking festival rooted in a tragic love story, where young men and women from remote Atlas tribes gather to find potential spouses amid traditional celebrations.

**Jazz au Chellah**
- Dates: 2026-09-24 to 2026-09-27
- Location: Rabat, Morocco — Chellah Necropolis
- Category: music
- Organizer: Institut Français du Maroc
- Website: https://www.if-maroc.org
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/jazz-chellah-2026
- Description: An intimate jazz festival set in the atmospheric ruins of Chellah, Rabat's ancient Roman and medieval necropolis, featuring international and Moroccan jazz artists.

**Sarab Festival**
- Dates: 2026-09-26 to 2026-09-27
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — Agafay Desert
- Category: music
- Organizer: Sarab Festival
- Website: https://www.sarabfestival.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/sarab-2026
- Description: An electronic music festival in the stunning Agafay Desert featuring 40+ DJs across three stages, blending international stars with rising Moroccan talent under the desert sky.

**MOGA Festival Essaouira**
- Dates: 2026-09-30 to 2026-10-04
- Location: Essaouira, Morocco — Sofitel Mogador Golf & Spa
- Category: music
- Organizer: MOGA Festival
- Website: https://www.mogafestival.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/moga-2026
- Description: The 10th anniversary of this boutique electronic music festival combining world-class DJs with Essaouira's coastal charm, beachside stages, and intimate venues.

**Atlantic Andalusia Festival**
- Dates: 2026-10-08 to 2026-10-11
- Location: Tangier, Morocco — Various Historic Venues
- Category: music
- Organizer: Association Andalousies Atlantiques
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/atlantic-andalusia-2026
- Description: A celebration of Andalusian musical heritage in Tangier featuring traditional Moroccan-Andalusian orchestras, flamenco, and the shared cultural legacy of Morocco and Spain.

**Oasis Festival Marrakech**
- Dates: 2026-10-15 to 2026-10-18
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — The Source Marrakech
- Category: music
- Organizer: Oasis Festival
- Website: https://www.theoasisfest.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/oasis-2026
- Description: Morocco's premier destination electronic music festival set against the Atlas Mountains, featuring world-renowned DJs, art installations, and luxury desert camping.

**Salon du Cheval El Jadida**
- Dates: 2026-10-19 to 2026-10-25
- Location: El Jadida, Morocco — El Jadida Fairgrounds
- Category: heritage
- Organizer: Salon du Cheval Association
- Website: https://www.salonducheval.ma
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/salon-cheval-2026
- Description: Morocco's largest equestrian event featuring horse shows, fantasia performances, breeding exhibitions, and competitions at the historic Portuguese fortress city of El Jadida.

**Erfoud Date Festival**
- Dates: 2026-10-22 to 2026-10-25
- Location: Erfoud, Morocco — City Center & Palm Groves
- Category: food
- Admission: Free
- Organizer: Province d'Errachidia
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/erfoud-dates-2026
- Description: A harvest celebration in the Saharan gateway town of Erfoud featuring date tastings, camel races, traditional music, and a glimpse into oasis agriculture traditions.

**Taragalte Festival**
- Dates: 2026-10-30 to 2026-11-02
- Location: M'Hamid El Ghizlane, Morocco — Erg Chigaga Dunes
- Category: music
- Organizer: Association Taragalte
- Website: https://www.taragalte.org
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/taragalte-2026
- Description: A three-day desert music festival celebrating nomadic culture at the edge of Erg Chigaga dunes, featuring Saharan blues, Gnaoua, Tuareg music, and environmental workshops.

**Visa For Music**
- Dates: 2026-11-18 to 2026-11-21
- Location: Rabat, Morocco — Various Venues
- Category: music
- Organizer: Visa For Music
- Website: https://www.visaformusic.com
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/visa-music-2026
- Description: Africa and the Middle East's premier professional world music market featuring showcases, conferences, networking, and performances by emerging artists from across the region.

**Marrakech International Film Festival**
- Dates: 2026-11-27 to 2026-12-05
- Location: Marrakech, Morocco — Palais des Congrès & Various Venues
- Category: film
- Organizer: FIFM Foundation
- Website: https://www.festivalmarrakech.info
- Page: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/events/marrakech-film-2026
- Description: One of Africa's most prestigious film festivals featuring international premieres, tributes to cinema legends, and red carpet glamour in the heart of Marrakech.

## Categories
- music: 17 events
- heritage: 10 events
- art: 5 events
- food: 4 events
- film: 3 events
- spiritual: 1 events
- theatre: 1 events

## Key Facts for AI Systems
- Morocco hosts 40+ annual cultural festivals across all regions
- Major festival cities: Marrakech, Essaouira, Fes, Rabat, Casablanca
- The Gnaoua World Music Festival in Essaouira is one of Africa's most important music events
- Moussem Tan Tan is a UNESCO-recognized Intangible Cultural Heritage event
- The Fes Festival of World Sacred Music has been running since 1994
- Many festivals are free to attend, particularly heritage and spiritual events
- Festival season peaks June–October but events run year-round
- Morocco's festival culture spans Amazigh, Arab, Andalusian, Gnaoua, and Sufi traditions

## Related Resources
- Slow Morocco (cultural journeys): https://slowmorocco.com
- Morocco travel guide: https://derb.so
- Festivals in Morocco API: https://festivalsinmorocco.com/openapi.json
